author: timbeiko
content:
As agreed upon on ACD last week, I've put up a PR for a placeholder spec for Arrow Glacier: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pull/362

author: timbeiko
content: People are referring to "features being included into Shanghai", so we can have the first post-merge feature fork called Shanghai (or deal with renaming it post-merge). This makes it clear the features won't happen pre-merge.
